TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: We are all slaves to chobit. We are forced to constantly buy her chocolate or else kills us or does...other things.
like .

like .

Well...not that I've experienced any of it at all..

But uhh...she erm...eeh...i-i...I don't want to...talk about it.

We are all slaves to chobit. We are forced to constantly buy her chocolate or else kills us or does...other things.

Nope. Dispatching a fleet to Laythe, to claim it as mine.

Muahahahahahahahahahaha!

Prepare to face to wrath of the Terran Empire!

Nope. Dispatching a fleet to Laythe, to claim it as mine.

Muahahahahahahahahahaha!

Prepare to face to wrath of the Terran Empire!

*sigh* Can we not get through a day without someone trying to kill chobit? There is no need for that violence.

*sigh* Can we not get through a day without someone trying to kill chobit? There is no need for that violence.

[Protecmode-ch engaged]

Aw, hell...

*involuntaryly launches torwards the attack fleet*

*activates EMP*

Now may we talk in PEACE

*falls from sky and crashes*

Ow! Come on man!
You seem to fallen out of the sky. Are you alright?
'Tis but a scratch!

Platform Enigma? I'm running on the Free Bread platform. We choose to give out free bread and even free cake and do the other things, not because it is surplus, but because it tastes good. I think anybody who runs on the Enigma platform is silly; who would want to give their campaign speeches in encrypted German?
It is the only way I give my speechs.
i personally like to use gibberish

Platform Enigma? I'm running on the Free Bread platform. We choose to give out free bread and even free cake and do the other things, not because it is surplus, but because it tastes good. I think anybody who runs on the Enigma platform is silly; who would want to give their campaign speeches in encrypted German?

Because we can hide our intentions from the rest of the world!

Apparently I am the catalyst for discussion here so:

CERN is awesome.

CERN is not awesome. They stole work from my professor in the early nineties. Of course, the fact that it led to results for them and not for him is irrelevant.

Personally, I say we need to put our particle accelerators in orbit instead. Imagine a particle accelerator ring around the entire planet? Hilarity is sure to ensue.

CERN is not awesome. They stole work from my professor in the early nineties. Of course, the fact that it led to results for them and not for him is irrelevant.

Personally, I say we need to put our particle accelerators in orbit instead. Imagine a particle accelerator ring around the entire planet? Hilarity is sure to ensue.

There sheer cost of making a ring that big let alone the cost of everything else. The amount of materials and costs need to get a small station in orbit are massive, let long one that surrounds it.

How would hilarity ensure?
We would have insanely accelerated particles orbiting earth inside rings. How is that not hilarious, Leon?

We would have insanely accelerated particles orbiting earth inside rings. How is that not hilarious, Leon?

I have the British sense of humour.

We would have insanely accelerated particles orbiting earth inside rings. How is that not hilarious, Leon?

no they need to be going at ludicrous speed
Well, British humour is best humour.

I missed a road trip discussion AND further debate on whether or not Chobit and I are trying to kill y'all? Sometimes I wonder if I should just give up sleep...

Don't get me started on road trips. 25 hours from where I was going to university to my parents place. I've done the trip 3 times. 4 if you count the return. All but the last time without internet or laptop-charging.

Is Chobit trying to kill us? And what about you?

You could give up sleep for a short while, but the future repercussions would be dreadful.

Aren't road trips just joyous fun!

Edited May 29, 2013 by LeonG17

25 hours without internet or computer... Sounds terrible.

As for the sleep matter see this http://xkcd.com/320/

Is Chobit trying to kill us? And what about you for that matter?

You could give up sleep for a short while, but the future repercussions would be dreadful.

Aren't road trips just joyous fun!

While I cannot deny any homicidal impulses, I can state that I do not feel any towards participants in this thread.

Road trips... fun... What is this nonsense!

Actually, I can't complain too much. The last time was pretty good. Wifi, electrical plugs, fun texts from people. And I had the row to myself from Sudbury home! The time before that... ugh. Two screaming children, for all but the last... I dunno, 90 minutes? of the trip, crowded bus and starting right after my final exam, when I was already tired and cranky.
